00017 Channel::Channel(QDomNode &channelNode): name_(),
00018 displayName_(), description_(), busInterfaces_() {
00019         // go through all the childnodes
00020         for (int i = 0; i < channelNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00021 
00022                 QDomNode tempNode = channelNode.childNodes().at(i);
00023 
00024                 // get the name
00025                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00026 
00027                         // strip all whitespace characters
00028                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00029                         name_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(name_);
00030                 }
00031 
00032                 // get the display name
00033                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:displayName")) {
00034                         displayName_ =
00035                                         tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00036                 }
00037 
00038                 // get the description
00039                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:description")) {
00040                         description_ =
00041                                         tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 // get the bus interface refs
00045                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:busInterfaceRef")) {
00046 
00047                         // appends string stripped of white space characters
00048                         QString temp = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00049                         busInterfaces_.append(General::removeWhiteSpace(temp));
00050                 }
00051         }
00052 
00053         // if mandatory elements are missing
00054         if (name_.isNull()) {
00055                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:name was not"
00056                                 " found"));
00057         }
00058         if (busInterfaces_.size() < 2) {
00059                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:busInterfaceRef"
00060                                 " was not found"));
00061         }
00062 }

00075 Channel& Channel::operator=( const Channel& other ) {
00076         if (this != &other) {
00077                 name_ = other.name_;
00078                 displayName_ = other.displayName_;
00079                 description_ = other.description_;
00080                 busInterfaces_ = other.busInterfaces_;
00081         }
00082         return *this;
00083 }

00088 void Channel::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00089         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:channel");
00090 
00091         // make sure the mandatory elements are defined
00092         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00093                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:name is empty"));
00094         }
00095         // if name was found its written
00096         else {
00097                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00098         }
00099 
00100         // optional element
00101         if (!displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00102                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", displayName_);
00103         }
00104 
00105         // optional element
00106         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00107                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00108         }
00109 
00110         // atleast 2 businterface refs must be found
00111         if (busInterfaces_.size() < 2) {
00112                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:busInterfaceRef is"
00113                                 " missing"));
00114         }
00115         // if they were found then write them to document
00116         else {
00117                 for (int i = 0; i < busInterfaces_.size(); ++i) {
00118                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:busInterfaceRef",
00119                                         busInterfaces_.at(i));
00120                 }
00121         }
00122         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:channel
00123         return;
00124 }
